caption.p: Boxplots of concentrations in 1981–2010 and the projected changes in 2016–2045 and 2036–2065. a Boxplots of seasonal daily averaged concentrations based on modelled hourly concentrations in the historical climatic period 1981–2010. b– f Change in hourly averaged concentrations as a result of climate change (Scenarios 2030, 2050-I, 2050-II, 2050-III, and 2050-IV). The box represents the interquartile distance (Q1–Q3) with the bold line representing the mean. The lines accompanied with the triangle represent the 2.5 % and 97.5 % quantiles. The dashed lines represent the 1 % and 99 % quantiles. Numbers near the boxplots represent the minimum and maximum rates per season. The red lines represent the years 2009, 2044, and 2064
